item.title: Migrating content to this site
item.description:
I’d previously written blog posts in WordPress but this site uses Markdown instead. The migration process was simply a case of exporting the old posts from WordPress (there’s a button in WordPress to do this) and Google “WordPress XML export to markdown”, which resulted in me using this: https://github.com/lonekorean/wordpress-export-to-markdown

There were various warning about deprecated dependencies but, running the script with npx, they weren’t installed. The blog posts were converted to markdown in a few seconds and then there was the process of tidying it up, especially embedded images/code and the FrontMatter.
